meanings.sent1: I will iterate the steps to make sure I understand them.
meanings.sent2: She likes to iterate her favorite song lyrics when she's happy.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to iterate the phrase 'Polly wants a cracker' perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The waves iterate their crashing against the shore with rhythmic precision.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to iterate the multiplication table until they memorized it.

meanings.sent1: He will iterate the magic trick until he gets it right.

meanings.sent3: The cat will iterate its meow until someone feeds it.
